column4: i mounted my hardy desktop iso, and added it to soures.lsit, when i do apt-get update, it ignores the iso image... why?
comment out all the other repos
okay i'll try

it's still ignoring, it says: "Get:1 file: hardy release.gpg then says: Ign file: hardly/main translation-en us and another hardy/restricted translation-en_us, then it gets file hardy Release, and ignores hardy/main packages and hardy/restricted packages
pastebin your /etc/apt/sources.list file
did you run apt-get update after commenting them out?
without seeing it im not sure (wont be here much longer either)

network upgrade uncomment archive.ubuntu lines comment out line you added and update than command "update-manger" and it should let you upgrade using internet
without the "
